profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Sales Engineer with a proven track record in **business development** and **technical sales** within water treatment industries. Adept at using **CRM** systems and proposal tools to drive sales processes and enhance customer engagement. Recognized for **problem-solving** abilities and effective **communication** skills that connect technical solutions to client needs. Bringing over 13 years of comprehensive experience in technology, including building high-performance applications in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and expertise in both frontend (React, Next.js, Vue) and backend (Node.js, FastAPI, Django) development.
Additionally proficient in deploying cloud-based solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing **microservices** and **CI/CD pipelines**. Committed to delivering value by aligning technology solutions with compliance standards and enhancing operational efficiency across diverse sectors.
